channel.title: Comments on: So I Screenshot Him, Two Times Through the Heart

item.title: By: UnionCarbide
item.dc:creator: UnionCarbide
item.description: Maybe you just didn't get him the GOOD tender crab meats. You got him crab meats from those crabs that hang out where the elves dump all their chamberpots, or something.
item.content:encoded: Maybe you just didn’t get him the GOOD tender crab meats. You got him crab meats from those crabs that hang out where the elves dump all their chamberpots, or something.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
That dwarf bastard never sent me baubles before -- he's been holding out! And I can promise that my rogue trainers never gave me ANY encouragement via email or otherwise. I was out there kicking ass and taking names and I got nary a word of encouragement or appreciation.
This leads me to one conclusion: Nerf druids!
item.content:encoded:
That dwarf bastard never sent me baubles before — he’s been holding out! And I can promise that my rogue trainers never gave me ANY encouragement via email or otherwise. I was out there kicking ass and taking names and I got nary a word of encouragement or appreciation.

This leads me to one conclusion: Nerf druids!

item.title: By: UnionCarbide
item.dc:creator: UnionCarbide
item.description: Actually, Blubber Gump has always mailed you shortly after you do his quest.
item.content:encoded: Actually, Blubber Gump has always mailed you shortly after you do his quest.
